languages.text: "Патент дозволяет брать ксеносов-слуг, однако я надеялся, что никогда не стану свидетелем того, как применяется на практике это... специфическое право".
"The Warrant does permit taking xenos servants, but I had hoped never to witness anyone actually invoke this... unique right."
languages.original_text: "Патент дозволяет брать ксеносов-слуг, однако я надеялся, что никогда не стану свидетелем того, как применяется на практике это... специфическое право".

traits.locale_text: "The Warrant does permit taking xenos servants, but I had hoped never to witness anyone actually invoke this... unique right."
"The Warrant does permit taking xenos servants, but I had hoped never to witness anyone actually invoke this... unique right."
"The Warrant does permit taking xenos servants, but I had hoped never to witness anyone actually invoke this... unique right."
"The Warrant does permit taking xenos servants, but I had hoped never to witness anyone actually invoke this... unique right."
"The Warrant does permit taking xenos servants, but I had hoped never to witness anyone actually invoke this... unique right."
"The Warrant does permit taking xenos servants, but I had hoped never to witness anyone actually invoke this... unique right."

languages.text: “神圣授状的持有者确实有权将异形收为仆从，但我本以为不会真的有人行使这种……独一无二的权利。”
languages.original_text: "The Warrant does permit taking xenos servants, but I had hoped never to witness anyone actually invoke this... unique right."

traits.locale_text: “神圣授状的持有者确实有权将异形收为仆从，但我本以为不会真的有人行使这种……独一无二的权利。”

languages.text: «La Patente permite reclutar xenos como sirvientes, pero esperaba no ver jamás a nadie utilizar este... derecho único».
languages.original_text: "The Warrant does permit taking xenos servants, but I had hoped never to witness anyone actually invoke this... unique right."

traits.locale_text: «La Patente permite reclutar xenos como sirvientes, pero esperaba no ver jamás a nadie utilizar este... derecho único».

languages.text: « La lettre autorise en effet à engager des serviteurs xénos, mais j'espérais ne jamais voir quelqu'un appliquer ce... droit unique. »
languages.original_text: "The Warrant does permit taking xenos servants, but I had hoped never to witness anyone actually invoke this... unique right."

traits.locale_text: « La lettre autorise en effet à engager des serviteurs xénos, mais j'espérais ne jamais voir quelqu'un appliquer ce... droit unique. »

languages.text: 「令状は異種族の従僕を連れて行くことを許可していますが、誰かが実際にこの…特異な権利を行使するのを見ることになるとは思いませんでした」
languages.original_text: "The Warrant does permit taking xenos servants, but I had hoped never to witness anyone actually invoke this... unique right."

traits.locale_text: 「令状は異種族の従僕を連れて行くことを許可していますが、誰かが実際にこの…特異な権利を行使するのを見ることになるとは思いませんでした」

languages.text: "Ruhsatname, zenoların hizmetkâr olarak alınmasına izin veriyor. Fakat kimsenin bu 'eşsiz' hakkı kullandığına şahit olmayı istemezdim."
languages.original_text: "The Warrant does permit taking xenos servants, but I had hoped never to witness anyone actually invoke this... unique right."

traits.locale_text: "Ruhsatname, zenoların hizmetkâr olarak alınmasına izin veriyor. Fakat kimsenin bu 'eşsiz' hakkı kullandığına şahit olmayı istemezdim."

languages.text: "Der Handelsbrief erlaubt Xenos-Diener, aber ich hatte gehofft, nie Zeuge werden zu müssen, dass jemand dieses ... einzigartige Recht tatsächlich in Anspruch nimmt."
languages.original_text: "The Warrant does permit taking xenos servants, but I had hoped never to witness anyone actually invoke this... unique right."

traits.locale_text: "Der Handelsbrief erlaubt Xenos-Diener, aber ich hatte gehofft, nie Zeuge werden zu müssen, dass jemand dieses ... einzigartige Recht tatsächlich in Anspruch nimmt."
